_PAGE_FILTER_MASK_ARGUMENTS_CHARS_: The number of characters to show unmasked at the end of the string.
_PAGE_FILTER_MASK_ARGUMENTS_MASK_: The character to use for masking.
_PAGE_FILTER_MASK_ARGUMENTS_VALUE_: The value to be masked. It will be converted to a string.
_PAGE_FILTER_MASK_DESCRIPTION_: Masks a given value, displaying only the last few characters.
